title: Little Cabin in the Woods
resume: Get away from the world that changes too fast, filled with too much information, and entangled in the net of complicated relationships. At a little house in the forest that lacks the conveniences of modern world like gas and wifi but is filled with the essentials, you can find true happiness of living a slow and simple life.
